RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Guidance system
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Target illumination and guidance system. Thanks to the thermal imager and laser guidance, it was possible to provide additional accuracy, especially when shooting in bad weather\n\nProvide extra accuracy.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Basic filtration system
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Basic air filtration systems. Help with not serious air poisoning

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Simple solar panels
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Simple solar panels for passive battery charging

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Echo System 'Plato'
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: The echo system “Plato” allows you to control the situation by 360 degrees due to the many helmet-mounted sensors located throughout the helmet. Therefore, there will be no unforeseen attacks from the back\n\nIncreases Dodge Chance

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Advanced filtration system
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Advanced air filtration system. It includes a special technology of a closed circuit, thanks to which not only protection against serious air poisoning is achieved, but also the consequences of supercooled/superheated air

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Advanced solar panels
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Advanced solar panels with next-generation cells for faster charging

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Brain energy protection
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Special development that generates a volumetric energy circuit around the brain to protect it

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: CULL solar panels
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Panels created using a special two-layer technology for additional capture of sunlight

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Stimulants
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Stimulants mounted directly in the armor provide targeted adrenaline injections, accelerating the wearer and reducing the chance of shock

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Reinforced Armor Cloth
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Complex fabric consisting of microparticles and using the technology of a reflective firewall, additional provides protection against conventional and electronic attacks.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Reinforced plates
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Reinforced plates made of an alloy of steel and plasteel are inserted into the armor to increase its effectiveness.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Antitoxic seals
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Hermetically sealed armor provides improved protection against radiation, gases, toxic substances and temperature

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Electric heater
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Generates heat through the consumption of electricity from the reactor.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: First aid interface
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Microprocessors built into the armor control the state of the vital systems of the body and carry out the directed allocation of small doses of panacelin to speed up the healing process.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Active plates
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Experimental plates that change their angle under the projectile to create a rebound angle.\nIncrease Armor

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Protein therapy of antigenesis
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Module stimulates the formation of blood vessels in all parts of the body, which increases the user's ability to withstand damage and at the same time weakens the negative effects of wounds

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Adrenaline injectors
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Special injectors that passively inject small doses of adrenaline into the blood. Increases movement speed, aiming and attack power

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Low voltage cladding
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: It connects a low voltage to the armor plating, which is why all attackers in melee get a shock effect. Consumes additional energy on impact

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: High voltage cladding
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: It connects high voltage to the armor plating, because of which all attackers in melee take damage from electricity. Consumes additional energy during an attack

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Kinetic buffer
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Metabolism accelerator controls the state of vital systems of the body and injects genetically modified stimulants to increase combat skills and athletic abilities

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Security interface
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Improved VI systems control enemy fire and redistribute energy to vulnerable points.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Combat exoskeleton
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: This experimental armor combines a mechanical amplifier and a firewall, increasing the physical strength of the fighter and providing protection from traditional weapons.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Medical exoskeleton
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: This experimental armor combines a mechanical amplifier and a firewall, increasing the physical strength of the fighter and providing protection from traditional weapons.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Titanium neodymium subcutaneous matrix
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Built on rare earth magnets and reinforced by power connections to the battery cell system. A neodymium substrate begins with several thousand ampoules with a dimorphic magnetorheological fluid (a mixture of carbonyl iron with a prismatic nanostructure). When activated, fluid is shot from tiny nozzles mounted under the skin. At the same time, the neodymium substrate is electrified, due to which the liquid hardens and shelters the user in an iron shell that protects him from any physical damage. "TITAN" is characterized by high energy consumption.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Scrim
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: The invisibility effect is achieved by creating a carefully tuned spherical electromagnetic field that controls the refraction of light in the vicinity of the user. The field circles the rays of light around the user and returns them to the previous path behind him with a distortion index of less than 3%. When entering into close combat, the system turns off and the effect of invisibility disappears.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Shock absorbers
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: The installation of micro gravimetric mechanisms in the armor provides more convenient movement.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Motorized joints
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Special mechanisms that help joints. Allow you to move faster and more convenient.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Energy boots
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Shoes accelerating its owner due to strong adhesion to the surface and the release of a small amount of energy. Increases energy consumption.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Energy accelerator
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Fills the sole with charged particles that push the wearer

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Ablation coating
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: The ablation coating is separated upon impact, removing the impact energy produced by bullets and shells from the body. It can be used 10 times, after that the coating needs to be changed.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.label: Shield Modulator
RimArmorCore.Mk1.ArmorModuleDef.description: Modulator generating an energy field around the armor. The force field is enough to reflect small damage. It requires the energy that it takes from the suit reactor.
